attributes.action: & HM-Govt not to associate himself & themselves w/ the Tibetan Dalai Lama of India by any open talks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Regardless & notwithstanding, please, there’re 3.8 miln of persons in the Chinese Auto Spec Adm Region Hong Kong who’re British nationals & of British nationality & natl status, alone, & otrs. in elsewhere; & any actions that are or could/may be perceived as “too much”, which the proposed meeting could & may be argued so, surely carries a small but potentially very serious risk & danger indeed to them themselves personally, & theirs lives, due to very possible diplomatic dispute or conflict, to put it very mildly. Where would 0.5 miln persons alone in UKGB get their birth certificates from then? 

Be believed or not, please, this could be so dangerous that, & it could happen, & so, again, please, just don’t do it. The PM & HMG must surely put the interests of if not the lives of such UKGB nationals overseas, regardless of colour or of (native) languages, before straight-forward aliens overseas, that we must say. Whatever it is, it is not worth it, so please don't do it and drop it.
